title: Oxygen: an introduction to chemistry
creator_credit: Jim Callner, Hans Halberstadt and Barr Films
brief_description: Explores the nature of oxygen. Shows that oxygen has three forms: solid, liquid and gas, and that when it combines with other atoms it forms new chemical compounds. Illustrates how animals use oxygen to release energy for activity and how plants use carbon dioxide to produce oxygen.
